Question: This person formed a club in 1906 for girls he viewed as surrogate granddaughters, the Angel Fish and Aquarium Club.
Hints: Also, this person smoked pipes constantly, and Susan Crane did not wish him to do so in her house.
Asteroid 2362 this person was named after him.
This occupation gave him his pen name, this person, from "mark twain," the cry for a measured river depth of two fathoms.
